A Nuxt 3 module to use Leaflet.
It was made using
which is a Vue 3 wrapper for Leaflet, that exposes the original Leaflet API as Vue components.
This module is really just about making it work with Nuxt 3 without the need to configure anything.
That's it! You can now use Leaflet in your Nuxt app ✨
For a complete list of the components available, check out the
Please note that components are exported in PascalCase, so for example, write

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Generate type stubs
npm run dev:prepare

# Develop with the playground
npm run dev

# Build the playground
npm run dev:build

# Run ESLint
npm run lint

# Run Vitest
npm run test
npm run test:watch

# Release new version
npm run release
